column4: anyone here who can help me a little with samba? win xp computer can't connect to my shares
samaba, what are the details (like what directory are you sharing?)
some folders on my ntfs disks
i can connect to my shares with my xbox running XBMC but i can't get into with win xp
what is the workgroup on your XP machine?
it is the same as my linux box
OK, does the machine (on XP) show up in "workgroup computers?
i don't know right at this time, as my sister just went to sleep, she has the computer in her room
Samba has trouble with workgroup names other than MSHOME so mabye you could make all the machines MSHOME?
do you know a way to fix so i can hear sound in more than one program at the time? I've tried to install the alsa codec, but it didnt help(do i have to reboot after install it?)
try the reboot.  I never had that problem, so the reboot should do it.
do you think it has something with soundcard? Maybe it's not supported good in ubuntu or something
support or card... I would say support is it works in windozes
yeah, it works great in windows
then its support, try the forums..
